overview: A horror drama short film about how a salesman's visit to a house alters a perfectly normal day for him.  Writer, Editor, Cinematographer & Director: Aman Saji Dominic  Original Background Score: Yadu Krishna  Subtitles: Shilpa Santhosh  Assistant Directors:  Anna Priya S Dominic  Sameera Nair Aryan Arun Lakshman  Colour Grading & Sound Design: Aman Saji Dominic  Cast:  Aaradhya Arun Lakshman Asher S Biju  Samyuktha Nair  Anna Priya S Dominic  Sameera Nair
title: MONSTER
